comments.text:
User Agent:  

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open about:memory in new Tab.
2. Press End.
3. Press Ctrl-R. (reload)
4. Press Home.


Actual results:

4. Vertical slider indicates wrong position. (it is not in top position)


Expected results:

4. Slider is the top position.
comments.raw_text:
User Agent:
